SEARCH
Package com.group22

Class UI

java.lang.Object
com.group22.UI
public class UI extends Object
The UI class is responsible for rendering the game's user interface, including the HUD (Heads-Up Display), title screen, pause screen, settings screen, and game over screen. It also manages on-screen messages and the display of the player's status such as health and collected items.

    • drawSubWindow

      public void drawSubWindow(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Draws a sub-window for nested menu items such as settings and rules.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the sub-window's top left corner.
      y - The y-coordinate of the sub-window's top left corner.
      width - The width of the sub-window.
      height - The height of the sub-window.
